Benefit from blockchain

Hot desk from
€159
/mo

Fair prices

Prices are set by Primalbase token holders. This creates a competitive pricing system that ensures you get a fair rate when booking.

Flexible booking

Book whenever and wherever–whether you're visiting town for a day or you're looking for a more permanent solution.

Secure, transferable membership model

Members own secure digital tokens, which can be transferred on a temporary or permanent basis with a minimal transaction cost.

Earn extra income

Our tokenised membership model means you can lease out your membership, allowing you to earn while you’re away.

Questions you ask

1. Why do you combine coworking and blockchain?

In short, our goal is to improve the membership model for shared workspaces by adding a digital aspect. Namely, issuing digital tokens to members. We call it a tokenised membership model. We turned to blockchain as it provides a ready-to-use infrastructure to certify the ownership, integrity and authenticity of a membership token. This leads to a secure, flexible membership model. Additionally, the inherently simplified membership transfer process allows token holders to lease out their tokens and earn money.

2. How does it work?

Primalbase is a community of permanent and part-time members. Our permanent members own Primalbase tokens (PBT). Token holders can use their tokens to book workspaces or they can lease their tokens out to part-time members via the Primalbase lease market. Read more here.

3. What’s the Primalbase business model?

Primalbase operates two main principles—traditional leasing and tokenised memberships. Our tokenised membership model is attractive for most people, as it allows token holders (e.g. members) to transfer and lease out workspaces. In turn, this gives less-committed guests fair prices and thriving community.

Additionally, Primalbase leases private offices and event spaces to companies, organisations and project teams. This more traditional relationship covers our operating costs, allowing us to maintain the Primalbase offices.

4. How to pay with Ethereum?

First, buy Ethereum on an exchange. Then pay. Click here for detailed instructions.

And a free cup of coffee—or three. Our managers are always excited to meet new potential members, show you around and answer any questions you might have.

Why our prices are estimated?

Our prices update regularly. When you book, you’re leasing somebody’s Primalbase token (PBT) at the lowest price available. Bookings are paid in Ethereum (ETH). For convenience, we show the approximate price in EUR. Our final price does not include any transaction fees charged by third parties (e.g. Ethereum network).
